SqlDefinition.SqlCommand: UPDATE emailsendbccaccount SET EmailSendBccAccountLastTime=NOW() <%=,EmailSendBccAccountState=@@EmailSendBccAccountState@@%> <%=,EmailSendBccAccountSendTime=@@EmailSendBccAccountSendTime@@%><%=,Result=@@Result@@%> WHERE EmailID=@@EmailID@@ <%= AND EmailSendBccAccountState=@@OldState@@%>;
DELETE FROM emailsendbccaccount WHERE EmailID=@@EmailID@@ <%= AND EmailSendBccAccountState=@@EmailSendBccAccountState@@%>;

SELECT esba.EmailSendBccAccountID,esba.EmailID,esba.EmailBccAccountID,esba.EmailAccountID,esba.EmailSendBccAccountState,esba.EmailSendBccAccountCreateTime,esba.EmailSendBccAccountLastTime,esba.EmailSendBccAccountSendTime,esba.Result FROM emailsendbccaccount AS esba WHERE 1=1 <%= AND esba.EmailSendBccAccountID=@@EmailSendBccAccountID@@%> <%= AND esba.EmailID=@@EmailID@@%> <%= AND esba.EmailBccAccountID=@@EmailBccAccountID@@%> <%= AND esba.EmailAccountID=@@EmailAccountID@@%> <%= AND esba.EmailSendBccAccountState=@@EmailSendBccAccountState@@%> <%= AND esba.EmailSendBccAccountCreateTime=@@EmailSendBccAccountCreateTime@@%> <%= AND esba.EmailSendBccAccountLastTime=@@EmailSendBccAccountLastTime@@%> <%= AND esba.EmailSendBccAccountSendTime=@@EmailSendBccAccountSendTime@@%> <%= AND esba.Result=@@Result@@%>;

SELECT esba.EmailSendBccAccountID,esba.EmailID,esba.EmailBccAccountID,esba.EmailAccountID,esba.EmailSendBccAccountState,esba.EmailSendBccAccountCreateTime,esba.EmailSendBccAccountLastTime,esba.EmailSendBccAccountSendTime,esba.Result,eba.`EmailBccAccountAddress`,ea.`EmailAccountAddress` FROM emailsendbccaccount AS esba JOIN `emailbccaccount` AS eba ON esba.`EmailBccAccountID`=eba.`EmailBccAccountID` LEFT JOIN `emailaccount` AS ea ON esba.`EmailAccountID`=ea.`EmailAccountID` WHERE 1=1 <%= AND esba.EmailSendBccAccountID=@@EmailSendBccAccountID@@%> <%= AND esba.EmailID=@@EmailID@@%> <%= AND esba.EmailBccAccountID=@@EmailBccAccountID@@%> <%= AND esba.EmailAccountID=@@EmailAccountID@@%> <%= AND esba.EmailSendBccAccountState=@@EmailSendBccAccountState@@%> <%= AND esba.EmailSendBccAccountCreateTime=@@EmailSendBccAccountCreateTime@@%> <%= AND esba.EmailSendBccAccountLastTime=@@EmailSendBccAccountLastTime@@%> <%= AND esba.EmailSendBccAccountSendTime=@@EmailSendBccAccountSendTime@@%> <%= AND esba.Result=@@Result@@%> <R%= AND eba.EmailBccAccountAddress LIKE '%@@EmailBccAccountAddress@@%'%R> LIMIT <R%= @@StartIndex@@, @@SelectCount@@ %R> ; SELECT COUNT(0) AS row_count FROM emailsendbccaccount AS esba JOIN `emailbccaccount` AS eba ON esba.`EmailBccAccountID`=eba.`EmailBccAccountID` LEFT JOIN `emailaccount` AS ea ON esba.`EmailAccountID`=ea.`EmailAccountID` WHERE 1=1 <%= AND esba.EmailSendBccAccountID=@@EmailSendBccAccountID@@%> <%= AND esba.EmailID=@@EmailID@@%> <%= AND esba.EmailBccAccountID=@@EmailBccAccountID@@%> <%= AND esba.EmailAccountID=@@EmailAccountID@@%> <%= AND esba.EmailSendBccAccountState=@@EmailSendBccAccountState@@%> <%= AND esba.EmailSendBccAccountCreateTime=@@EmailSendBccAccountCreateTime@@%> <%= AND esba.EmailSendBccAccountLastTime=@@EmailSendBccAccountLastTime@@%> <%= AND esba.EmailSendBccAccountSendTime=@@EmailSendBccAccountSendTime@@%> <%= AND eba.EmailBccAccountAddress LIKE '%@@EmailBccAccountAddress@@%'%> <%= AND esba.Result=@@Result@@%>;

SELECT eba.* FROM emailsendbccaccount AS esba JOIN `emailbccaccount` AS eba ON esba.`EmailBccAccountID`=eba.`EmailBccAccountID` WHERE 1=1 AND esba.EmailID=@@EmailID@@ <%= AND esba.EmailSendBccAccountState=@@EmailSendBccAccountState@@%>;
